title: The Cornish comedy as it is acted at the Theatre-Royal in Dorset-Garden by His Majesty's servants.
author: Powell, George, 1658?-1714.
publisher: Printed for D. Brown ... and T. Bennet ... and K. Gately ...,
notes: Dedication signed by George Powell, who asserts that the play was given to him by the author.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
